= Eventlist Display =
_Shortcode options are listed in the following format_
<br>*option* = "sample value" `[` *default* | valid input type `]`

*categories* = "1,2,3" `[` *all* | one or more comma separated category ids `]`
<br>Display only events associated with listed [#manage_categories category ids*]

*excluded* = true `[` *false* | true `]`
<br>Display only events NOT associated with categories listed in the categories parameter

*start* = "2011-07-10" `[` "*today*" | [#Date_Options see Date options] `]`
<br>Display events starting on or after the specified date

*end* = "tomorrow" `[` *"+1 year"* | [#Date_Options see Date options] `]`
<br>Display events ending on or before the specified date

*limit* = 5 `[` *15* | integer `]`
<br>Limit events displayed to the specified integer

*whitelabel* = true `[` *false* | true `]`
<br>Display events without colors

*reverse* = false `[` *false* | true `]`
<br>Display events in reverse order

*noresults* = "Nada" `[` *"No Upcoming Events"* | text `]`
<br>Display specified text when no events are returned

= Date Options =
_Acceptable dates input include:_
  # `[` YYYY-MM-DD `]` 
    * 2010-10-10
    * 2011-01-01
  # `[` + | - `]` `[` 1 - 9 | next | last `]` `[` days | week/s | month/s | year/s `]`
    * +3 days
    * +2 weeks
    * -2 months
    * -3 years
    * last week
    * next month
    * yesterday
    * tomorrow
    * today

= Manage Categories =
Category ids listed on the plugin Manage Categories page
